A homepage displaying general office information and a welcome message
An 'About Us' page providing details about the clinical office and its mission
A 'Services' page listing all medical services offered by the office
A 'Contact Us' page with a form allowing users to send messages to the office
A navigation menu enabling quick access to all main pages
Frontend styled with a light cyan background and cadet blue UI components
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
Backend API support for handling contact form submissions
Database integration using PostgreSQL with specified environment variables
Frontend fetches dynamic data from backend APIs where applicable
Package.json configured with `install:all` script to install frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with `dev` script to start frontend and backend concurrently
Static page rendering for informational content
Form validation on the contact page to ensure proper user input
SEO-friendly page titles and meta descriptions for each page
